title: paramanai chintai sheyvOm
sahitya:
paramanai cintai sheivOm orumaiyuDan paramanai cintai seyvOm



anupallavi



haranennum hari enrum ayanenrum muttozhil Akki viLaiyADum aruTperum

jyOtiyAm



caraNam 1



mAnAbhimAmattai mArAmal aDakkiyE manakkurangin cETTai anaittum

oDukkiyE

nAnenum Anavam nANittalai kuniya nAnA vikAraminrit-tAnE tAnAgiDum



caraNam 2



vAnattin virivilE vaLarum sUriyan pOlE vaiyattilE veLLi malaiyin

mANbaippOlE

mOnattilE shuddha jnAnattilE shivan muktiyilE vaLar shakti mahEshanAm
